1.content:
It is a cool summer evening and you are walking home from a friend's house. You luckily only lived a few blocks away. Feeling your bed calling you for some rest you quicken your pace. It's a very bright night and you look up at the full moon. While you are staring up at the night sky something zooms past and crashes into the yard on the other side of the street. You cross the road and run towards crater wanting to investigate the meteorite. You had never seen one before and this would be an awesome story to tell your friends! There, lying in the dirt, was the small sphere. It gives off a slight luminescent glow as you crouch down next to it. Still curious, you reach out and pick up the baseball sized rock. Eww, gross! It wasn't a rock at all! It feels slimy and soft.

Suddenly the 'meteorite' starts to slightly vibrate and hum in your hand before it explodes into a cloud of green mist! You try to cover your face, but the damage is done. The alien spore has infected you. It quickly seeps into your bloodstream and circulates through your body touching every cell. It starts to evolve and incorporates your DNA into itself.

You leave the crater and walk home. When you get back you strip out of your disgusting clothes and throw them in the trash. You walk to the bathroom and stare at your reflection in the mirror above the sink. You looked fine and didn't feel sick. But carriers don't exhibit any symptoms. You turn off the light and head to bed.

Who are you?
1.title: Beginning

12.content:
Your name is Kelsey Langston. You are 25 years old and live with your boyfriend, Marcus. You are 5 feet 2 inches tall and have short blonde hair. You have an impressive figure that you work hard to maintain. You have large D-cup sized breasts, a firm butt, and a taut stomach. You try to exercise everyday and carefully plan every meal. It helps that you took nutrition as a minor in college. Saying that you loved your body was an understatement.

You yawn and walk back to your bedroom. Your boyfriend was already asleep and sprawled across the bed. "Is that you Kels?" He groggily asks as you pull back the covers and climb into bed. He rolls over and gives you a kiss before falling back asleep instantly. You close your eyes and try to do the same. While Marcus sleeps the disease transferred from your lips slowly spreads throughout his body. You have unknowingly infected the first of many.

You wake up the next morning feeling a lot better. You lie in bed for a moment as the morning light peeks through the curtains. You could barely remember last nights encounter with the strange orb and you wonder if you imagined the whole thing. I'll go for a run later and look for the crater. Yeah that sounds like a good idea. Then you can put you mind at ease for good. You roll over to give Marcus a morning kiss, but he isn't there. He would sleep until noon if he was given the chance.

That's strange. Must be in the shower. You kick your feet out from under the blanket and over the edge of the bed. You wiggle your little toes in the carpet as you stand. I think I'll join him after yoga. You like to start every morning with a few sun salutations to loosen your body up. As you begin you rhythmically breathe in and out. Breathing was ninety percent yoga after all! Closing your eyes, you find balance and stillness. The only sound being your breath. You finish up a few minutes later and walk down the hall towards the bathroom. It sounds like the shower is still running. You quietly open the bathroom door and pull off the oversized t-shirt you slept in. You giggle in anticipation wanting to surprise him.
12.title: An adult female

15.content: What if somebody else found the meteorite and you transformed alongside the rest of the world? Who finds it?
15.title: More

1531.content: The next day, the disease has infected a bunch of new people. Which story should we follow the perspective from?
1531.title: Jennifer Lawrence

choices: His wife Louise, 38 who had transformed as well
His daughter Kim, 14 who had transformed as well
15311.content: Joseph was an engineer waking up after a long shift the day before. But he could feel something different. He was no longer 6 ft 1 and had shrunk to 5 ft 9. His hair was now a blonde and his eyes were blue. Joseph didn't realise it yet but he now had been infected and was now an identical copy of Jennifer Lawrence. Joseph woke up to what he believed to be just another day, moving his new blonde hair out of his face. He went to his mirror and let out a gasp. He stood in shock: He was a woman: But not just any woman, a celebrity at that as well. Joseph was panicking wondering what the hell he would do. Was Jennifer in his body now? Would he be stuck like this forever? He switched on the news to see if anything odd was going on. Nothing but bog standard breakfast news. Someone knocked on the door with a familiar female voice: Who was it?
15311.title: An adult man

info.brief_description: The entire world transforms into you!
info.description: When you come into contact with a strange, glowing meteorite you unknowingly became a carrier for an alien disease. Once infected an individual quickly transforms into an identical copy of yourself regardless of their age or sex. When the epidemic reaches global proportions how does mankind react when the all turn into you?
